title: PRI's The World: 02/10/2015
teaser: In a rare interview with the BBC, Syrian president Bashar al-Assad says he's indirectly working with the US to battle ISIS. Also, we look at the risks of volunteering in conflict zones in light of confirmation that US aid worker Kayla Mueller, who was held by ISIS, has died in Syria. Later, we'll check out a film festival in North Korea, and find out why a bunch of Swedish women launched their own brewery â€” called FemAle, of course!
